name: Operation: S.S.B.
description:
お前ら！任務開始だ！

You guys! It's time for our mission!

--

STORY

Kageyama Shien, mafia boss from the land of beast men, one day finds that 4 of his previously loyal subordinates have gone rogue!
Join him on his quest to find out what these rogue subordinates are planning, and help him fight to bring them back to his side!

--

DISCLAIMER

This is a free, fan-made game, unaffiliated with Holostars’ Kageyama Shien, Hololive Productions, or Cover Corporation.

All dialogue in this game does not reflect the opinions of the characters.

Do not, under any circumstances, redistribute, modify, or take credit for this game in any way.

このフリーゲームはカバー株式会社様のホロスターズタレント「影山シエン」を用いて作られた二次創作物です。

このゲーム内のセリフは全てキャラクターの意見を反映したものではありません。

このゲームを再配布、変更、またはクレジットを取得しないでください。

--

Please tweet your reactions and thoughts at #OperationSSB2021

「#OperationSSB2021」のタグで感想とかを呟いてください！
